title: Saudi Arabia deposited USD 5 billion in Turkish central bank
description:
The kingdom made the announcement via a statement on the state-run Saudi Press Agency, describing it as "a testament to the close cooperation and historical ties that exist between the kingdom of Saudi Arabia and the Republic of Turkiye and its brotherly people"

title: Saudi Arabia's 'shocks' Pak; Refuses money to shore up Pak's Forex, secure IMF bailout
description:
Saudi Arabia's 'shocks' Pak; Refuses money to shore up Pak's Forex, secure IMF bailout

title: 'Bitter rivals' Iran and Saudi Arabia resume ties, to activate 1998 agreement on trade, investments
description:
Top security officials of Saudi Arabia and Iran reached an agreement in Beijing

The two leading Shi'ite and Sunni Muslim powers in the Middle East have been at odds for years, and backed opposite sides in proxy wars from Yemen to Syria and elsewhere.
